Description:How far are you willing to go in order to save another? Homo for the answer to this question is quite clear: To the edge of the world, and further, if required. Go with him on a journey through a bizarre landscape fabulous 2D-style game Point & click! Far, far away, in peace and tranquility of the valley lived a secret gay and his dog Dingo. Nothing disturbed their peaceful life until one terrible happened: unknown aliens abducted another Homo. To return a beloved dog, Homo must procure for rare alien crystal. This crystal is in a deep pit, and pass it well protected - get it will not be easy! But there is no choice, and the hero will have to do what needs stranger ... Want to help Homo? Then get ready for the surreal journey through ingenious puzzles.

Features:
From the creators of the series of games Deponia, The Whispered World and Edna & Harvey - The Breakout
Study fantastic environment, like a dream, in the style of Point & click
Created with love animation, hand drawn backgrounds and amazing puzzle
Unusual nonverbal communication between the characters in the comic style
